description: There's nothing quite like celebrating something blue with a delicate, easy-to-make drink. The Something Blue will make any occasion more fun with its bright color and taste. This cocktail includes&nbsp;white wine,&nbsp;ginger ale, and&nbsp;hpnotiq liqueur, giving its ocean&nbsp;blue color.
name: The Something Blue

recipeInstructions.name: Chill the ingredients in a refrigerator.
recipeInstructions.text: Chill the ingredients in a refrigerator.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the Hpnotiq, white wine, and then the ginger ale in a champagne flute.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the Hpnotiq, white wine, and then the ginger ale in a champagne flute.
